ygData.subject: Re: You regain concentration and continue casting...
ygData.msgSnippet: How about this one?  I was in unrest trying to retrieve my corpse.  Well I ran in a barbed bone (probably the one that killed me originally, heh) along with
ygData.messageBody:
How about this one? I was in unrest trying to retrieve my corpse. Well I
ran in a barbed bone (probably the one that killed me originally, heh) along
with his pal a ghoul. I couldnt see the way out because I had no light
source and was stunned and spun around. I had no hope of running so I just
hit gate and prayed (not much chance of gating out while being hit on due to
the long casting time). The first time it was interrupted but the second
time I continued casting after being hit twice or three times for a total of
over 50 damage by the skeleton and ghoul. To my level 20 character the
skeleton conned red (around level 25). This is the most extreme and lucky
example I have seen of continuing casting, and my dexterity is only 74. My
wisdom is 93, so I would tend to think that wisdom has more of a bearing
that dexterity, although I have seen more people attribute continuing to
dex, so I am not sure.

One thing is for sure, I didnt continue much against ANYTING including blues
until about level 12 or 15. This makes me thing that your channeling skill
has some bearing on this as well. At level 21 now I do get interrupted
quite a lot, but I also continue a lot. If this trend continues, I figure
at higher levels you will continue more often than you get interrupted.

Any wizards out there with high dex (gnomes start with 85 dex I believe)
care to comment on this?

-Solric of the 6th circle


-----Original Message-----
From: Neil Lambert [mailto:smartass@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 9:36 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Two ideas for wizards.


From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>

apparently i have found that i've only regained concentration on bluees but
it's happened many times


-----Original Message-----
From: Dan Alexander <dalex@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 7:02 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Two ideas for wizards.


>From: Dan Alexander <dalex@...>
>
>At 04:00 PM 05/31/1999 -0700, you wrote:
>>>>>
>if you wanted to keep it balanced you wouldn't be allowed to use it every
>couple of seconds!!! maybe every six minutes like mend. i think a better
>idea would be the it would do more damage and that spell when using
>concentrate would not be able to be interrupted (ever heard "soandso
>regains concentration and continues casting")
>
>
>
>Never in my life =). It's a pretty much unspoken rule, that if anything
>connects with my character, my spell is interrupted. What stat determines
>this anyway? I've heard people say wisdom, but I can't picture how eq
>would connect wisdom and the ability to focus on a single task. <shrug>
>Anyway, whatever it is, I'm going to plink some points down in it with my
>next casting character.
>
>-Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe
>
